citations.narrative:
The facility notified the USDA inspector that they had found the female African Crested Porcupine deceased in the
enclosure housing the male African Crested Porcupine . On 7/28/2023, an employee found the animal deceased with
quills from the male embedded in her upper body . Approximately three weeks ago, a plywood wall had been constructed
in the enclosure to separate the porcupines due to incompatibility issues. The female was able to escape her enclosure
and gain access to the males enclosure resulting in her death . Housing facilities must be structurally strong and
maintained in good repair to protect animals from injury and contain the animals .
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the wildlife curator.
n

narrative:
3.125(a)  Critical Repeat
   
Facilities, general. 
The facility notified the USDA inspector that they had found the female African Crested Porcupine deceased in the 
enclosure housing the male African Crested Porcupine . On 7/28/2023, an employee found the animal deceased with 
quills from the male embedded in her upper body . Approximately three weeks ago, a plywood wall had been constructed 
in the enclosure to separate the porcupines due to incompatibility issues. The female was able to escape her enclosure 
and gain access to the males enclosure resulting in her death . Housing facilities must be structurally strong and 
maintained in good repair to protect animals from injury and contain the animals . 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the wildlife curator. 
 
 n
